content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TRT
      operator: equal_to
      value: OTHER
Core:
  Id: CORE-000160
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TRT = 'OTHER'
Outcome:
  Message: --TRT is equal to 'OTHER'
  Output Variables:
    - --TRT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0342
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'Interventions: If a list of specific treatments is
                  provided along with "Other, Specify", --TRT should be populated
                  with the name of the treatment found in the specified text.'
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.7.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Interventions: If a list of specific treatments is provided along with "Other, Specify", --TRT should be populated with the name of the treatment found in the specified text.
